meta_description: Beaches Museum and History Park in Jacksonville Beach, Florida is used for history tours and Jacksonville Beach weddings in the Beaches Museum Chapel.
admission_text:
## For Renewals

If you are an existing member and wish to renew your membership online, use the choices below as if you are a new member.

## For New Memberships

Join us in preserving, understanding and celebrating the history of the Beaches – become a member of the Beaches Museum. Join now, and you receive all the benefits of membership, including access to historic buildings, the Beaches Museum and rotating exhibits showcasing the colorful heritage of our Beaches communities.

[BECOME A MEMBER](https://interland3.donorperfect.net/weblink/weblink.aspx?name=E352392&id=162)

## Benefit Package for all Membership Levels

  * Free admission to the Museum
  * Free admission to members-only exhibition preview receptions
  * Reciprocal admission to selected museums at discounted rates + more being added! [North American Reciprocal Museum Association](https://narmassociation.org/members/) (at “Family” level and higher) and [Southeastern Museums Conference](https://www.semcdirect.net/SERM-Participants)
  * Free subscription to Tidings Newsletter
  * Free admission to select lectures and programs at Beaches Museum
  * 10% discount in the Museum Shop
  * Plus additional benefits depending on level…

## Membership Levels

Choose what best suits your budget and support for the museum.

### Single Membership: $50 (Monthly payment plan not available)

  * One membership card
  * 2 one-time Guest Passes

### Family Membership: $120

  * 2 membership cards and free admission for each membe...
accessibility_text:
All buildings on the Beaches Museum property have ramp access and a wheelchair is available upon request. All videos have either a transcript or close-captioning available for guests. There is also an audio version of the tour through our history park available on the app, CLIO. You can access the tours [here](https://theclio.com/entry/99431/tour) or by scanning the QR code on the signs in our park.

If you have an accessibility concern, or notice an area for improvement, please, email the Operations Manager at info@beachesmuseum.org.

Thank you!
collections_text:
## No matter your age, or whether you’re a guest visiting the area or a proud resident of Jacksonville’s beach communities (Mayport, Neptune Beach, Jax Beach, Atlantic Beach, Ponte Vedra, and Palm Valley), the Beaches Museum provides something for all.

Our diverse range of experiences offered — events, exhibits, archives, and more — give life to the vibrant history and culture of the area. With each visit to the Beaches Museum, explore the past, present, and future of Jacksonville’s beach communities, as well as what makes each community unique and what binds us together.
